Guest Molecules.Mechanism: π–π interaction with pyrazine rings enabling passage through dynamic aperture

Other Information.Additional Info: Adsorption capacity of approximately 1.45 mmol g−1 at 50 kPa

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Excluded due to strong CH···Cl hydrogen bonding and absence of π–π interaction

Other Information.Additional Info: Negligible adsorption (0.06 mmol g−1 at 50 kPa)

Sieving Mechanism: Dynamic recognizing mechanism combining rigid and flexible framework properties

Experimental Validation.Method: Single-component adsorption isotherms, breakthrough experiments, DFT calculations
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Selectivity over 10^6 in vapor phase, selectivity of 10^4 in liquid phase

Other Information.Additional Info: The material shows excellent recyclability and stability, maintaining structure after adsorption and breakthrough experiments
